channel.title: Comments on: WebMatrix – Routing and Magic Pages
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.content:encoded:
Just a quick addendum, I did find another page that properly called them “Web Pages” today, the ASP.Net MVC 4 roadmap: http://aspnet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=ASP.NET%20MVC%204%20RoadMap

I think someone went too generic, though. I’m not sure how seriously that name can be used since it’s basically unsearchable.
